name: react-castles
description: When visiting one of Japan's famous castles, you can apply a unique rubber stamp to your notebook. Use this application to prepare for a trip, read and write reviews, and learn fun facts on your journey to collect all 100 stamps.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
